MESSAGE:
Di sebabkan x ramai local talent & ramai dibuang kerja, boleh la belajar daripada saya. Kita target belajar web scraping menggunakan Python & BeautifulSoup. 
Live streaming ni sesuai untuk night owl macam saya. Yang early bird boleh tengok lagi ulangan pada hari keesokannya.

Prerequisite
Python 3.9
Jupyter Notebook

Good luck!!!

P.S: Kalau ada sambutan bagus video ini, saya akan ajar macam mana nak deploy ke dalam Azure Function.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_o16hVrRXXE

**Job Description & Requirements**
MoVal is a Finnish services company providing high-level IT expertise combined with business area-specific know-how which was founded in 2015. The company helps with project management, software development and deployment, cloud development etc.

Right now, Moval is looking for an experienced Python Developer, a specialist in the field of monitoring technologies to join a customer's cloud project (the name of the customer is under NDA) in the Telecommunications sphere. 

Must have skills:

1. Strong experience of following technologies/products:

  - Postgres DB;
  - Prometheus;
  - Grafana;
  - Vault (Hashicorp);
  - Netbox;
  - Influxdata (Influxdb, Kapacitor, Telegraf);
2. Experience with Terraform; Kubernetes, Docker; AWS, Azure
3. Strong knowledge of English
